title: Osho - The Book Of Wisdom vol 1 (16 files)
description:
The Book of Wisdom
Discourses on Atisha's Seven Points of Mind Training
Talks given from 11/02/79 am to 10/03/79 am
English Discourse series
28 Chapters
Year published: 1993

The complete series of talks that Osho gave on the early Buddhist mystic Atisha were first given in 2 volumes. 
This is volume 1, 01-16
 "Meditate on Atisha, listen to his advice. This is not a philosophy, it is a manual to discipline yourself, it is a manual for inner transformation. It is a book that can help you grow into wisdom." An extraordinarily straightforward journey into the world Buddhism as seen by this little-known mystic.
new edition of this book is very much edited and trimmed.
This is crime!
there are still non-edited versions. Link is given in info file.
Therefore it is best to have audios and videos (some of them are also edited)
